// Pivot 0, 0
int triangle_left_idle[20] = {
	0, 52,
	0, 5,
	2, 1,
	6, 0,
	12, 2,
	46, 63,
	47, 68,
	44, 72,
	38, 72,
	3, 56
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float triangle_left_idle[20] = {
	0.000000f, 0.712329f,
	0.000000f, 0.068493f,
	0.041667f, 0.013699f,
	0.125000f, 0.000000f,
